description: The athletic fit of their Men’s Merino Sport Ultralite Long Sleeve complements the movements of your body. With comfort features like offset shoulder and side seams to help minimize chafing, this very light and soft tee is made with a blend of ZQ-certified Merino wool with Tencel™ performance fabric, so it helps you feel cool even as your activity intensifies. Plus, it’s designed with reflective elements for low-light conditions, so this tee is great as a standalone for early-evening runs or as a base layer for your next cool-weather adventure.
name: Smartwool Active Ultralite LS - Mens

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool, 47% Lyocell. Exclusive Of Decoration
